item.title: The Invisible Threat
item.description: Behind every first responder is their trusty workhorse: the rugged Chevy Silverado Ambulance, the iconic Rev Group Ladder Tower, and the legendary Ford Crown Victoria and Explorer police interceptors. These vehicles — built in the United State — are themselves every bit as American as the counties they serve. Emergency services in the United States trust American-made vehicles for two reasons: their dependable durability and reliability. These two qualities enable first responders to operate optimally in a wide variety of adverse conditions and situations.
